sentences.sContent: If I had been, I would have set my signet on the biter.
sentences.sContent_eng: If I had been, I would have set my signet on the biter.
sentences.sCn: 如果我被咬了，我会在咬我的狗上留下印章的。

sentences.sContent: The fateful call came that evening, informing us that the recovered body had a signet ring with the initials JKJ—Jeffrey Kelly James.
sentences.sContent_eng: The fateful call came that evening, informing us that the recovered body had a signet ring with the initials JKJ—Jeffrey Kelly James.
sentences.sCn: 当晚致命的电话打来了，通知我们被发现的遗体上有一个图章戒指，其上有首字母缩写JKJ 杰弗里·凯利·詹姆斯。

trans.tranOther: a metal object used for printing a small pattern in  wax  as an official  seal 1 2
to stamp or authenticate with a signet
